description: This well-kept, welcoming restaurant with a colourful decor and wine bottles adorning the walls serves imaginative dishes with modern combinations – our inspector particularly enjoyed the guinea fowl supreme with smoked black tea, carrots and beluga lentils. The well-chosen wine list features labels from Italy and further afield.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
